commandobject.name: Pick
commandobject.documentation: When automatic pickup is disabled for bot (in ini bDisableAutoPickup=true) or if set by CONF {AutoPickupOff True}, use this command to pickup inventory the bot is currently at. Will fail if the bot can't pickup the item for some reason - weaponstay true and already had it before or etc.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: Id of the pickup we want to pick up.
